Header: New KDU Vice Chancellor Meets Army Commander
Content: Air Vice Marshal Sagara Kotakadeniya, Vice-Chancellor of the Sir John Kotelawala Defence University (KDU) this morning (12) paid a courtesy call on Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake, Commander of the Army at the Army Headquarters. Mutual matters of relevance to the future of the KDU and its tri service faculty studies, considering the fast swelling and changing global scenario were taken up for discussion during this cordial meeting. Air Vice Marshal Kotakadeniya was recently appointed as the KDU Vice Chancellor and this was his first formal call-on on the Commander of the Army who is also a member of the KDU Senate. The cordial meet ended with exchange of mementos as tokens of goodwill and understanding.
